abstract: A former Dow Jones & Company director and three associates will pay more than $24 million to settle charges that the associates traded illegally on inside knowledge of the News Corporation‘s takeover of Dow Jones, federal regulators announced on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: A former Dow Jones & Company director and three associates will pay more than $24 million to settle charges that the associates traded illegally on inside knowledge of the News Corporation‘s takeover of Dow Jones, federal regulators announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: S.E.C. Fines 4 for Trades Involving Dow Jones
